author: Reuters Editorial
title: REFILE-BRIEF-Mothercare Says Newton-Jones Re-Joins Board On Friday As CEO
text:
(Removes extraneous word in headline)
May 18 (Reuters) - Mothercare PLC:
* MARK NEWTON-JONES RE-JOINS BOARD TODAY AS CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER OF MOTHERCARE ON A SALARY OF Â£480,000PA
* DAVID WOOD REMAINS AN EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR OF GROUP AND HAS BEEN APPOINTED GROUP MANAGING DIRECTOR. Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
